resources.string: We conduct a variety of quizzes such as SpEnt,MELA,India,Gen along with theme quizzes
Slam Poetry Workshop provides an insight into the wonderful world of slam poetry
Our Annual National level Debate Tournament organised in the month of August
Inter-MU Literary fest. Open to all years
Introduces you to the intricacies of debating. Two debating styles followed: British Parliamentary and Asian Parliamentary
LDQ\'s category in TechTatva, MIT\'s TechFest. Comprises of 3 quizzes: SciEnt, BizTech and General
LDQ\'s category in Revels, MIT\'s Cultureal Fest. Comprises of 8 events ranging from quizzes to potpourri
Fun event. First round includes Rebus puzzles, anagrams, kangaroo words. Final round includes different forms of Charades, Taboo, Pictionary, Twenty Questions etc.

Stands for Quiz Meet Quiz. Weekly quizzes (held on Sundays). Theme and questions decided by the winning team of previous QMQ. Participants divided into three 3 pots based on experience. Rs. 30 for participation. Winner takes all. Open to all
Weekly meetings of the Debating Society of LDQ, Manipal. Mock debates are held and are focused on refining good debaters and unearthing new talent. Open to all.

Ergo is LDQ\'s newest category in Revels, MIT\'s annual cultural fest. It\'s primarily a quizzing category with 3 quizzes which include Gen, India and Lone Wolf. It also has a British Parliamentary Debate

Error: Plus.PeopleApi.getCurrentPerson returned null. Ensure that the Google+ API is enabled for your project, you have a properly configured google-services.json file and that your device has an internet connection.
Contacts access is needed in order to retrieve your email address.
Signing in, signing out, and revoking access.
Signing in, signing out, and revoking access with Google Drive permissions.
Retrieving an ID Token for the user.
